presser 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Generic web app for testing HTTP clients

Source: R/httpbin.R
httpbin_app.Rd

A web app similar to https://httpbin.org.

httpbin_app(log = interactive())

Arguments

log

Whether to log requests to the standard output.

Value

A presser_app.

Examples

app <- httpbin_app()
proc <- new_app_process(app)
url <- proc$get_url("/get")
resp <- curl::curl_fetch_memory(url)
curl::parse_headers_list(resp$headers)
#> $`content-type`
#> [1] "application/json"
#> 
#> $`content-length`
#> [1] "286"
#> 
#> $date
#> [1] "2020-04-09 10:38:34"
#> 
#> $etag
#> [1] "\"fdd4fe0e\""
#> 
cat(rawToChar(resp$content))
#> {
#>   "args": {},
#>   "headers": {
#>     "host": "127.0.0.1:49490",
#>     "user-agent": "R (3.6.3 x86_64-apple-darwin15.6.0 x86_64 darwin15.6.0)",
#>     "accept": "*/*",
#>     "accept-encoding": "deflate, gzip"
#>   },
#>   "origin": "127.0.0.1",
#>   "path": "/get",
#>   "url": "http://127.0.0.1:49490/get"
#> }
proc$stop()
